Package renderer.algebra

Class ArrayBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • renderer.algebra.ArrayBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Matrix, Vector
    public abstract class ArrayBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class for array-based mathematical objects. Contains only operations that work on flat arrays without regard to structure.

        Returns:
        a string describing the dimensions

      • fillRandom

        protected final void fillRandom()
        Fills the internal array with random values between 0.0 (inclusive) and 1.0 (exclusive). This is a pure array operation.

      • copyValues

        protected final void copyValues​(double[] source,
                                int start,
                                int length)
        Copies values from a source array into the internal storage. Copies from source[start] to source[start + length - 1] into values[0] to values[length - 1]. This is a pure array operation.
        Parameters:
        source - the source array
        start - the starting index in the source array
        length - the number of elements to copy
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if start or length are invalid or out of bounds

      • copyValues

        protected final void copyValues​(double[] source)
        Copies values from a source array into the internal storage. This is a pure array operation.
        Parameters:
        source - the source array
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if source size doesn't match

      • scaleValues

        protected final void scaleValues​(double factor,
                                 double[] dest)
        Scales all elements by a constant factor directly into a destination array. This is a pure array operation.
        Parameters:
        factor - the scaling factor
        dest - the destination array
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if destination size doesn't match
